<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Blessed Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=1912) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Metamagic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=107" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 162 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Blessed One](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=51)

**Frequency**
once per 10 minutes

**Prerequisites**
[Blessed One Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1910); ability to cast spells from spell slots; [Mercy](/Feats.aspx?ID=225)

</column>

---

When you focus your magic on an ally, you can remove harmful conditions. If your next action is to Cast a Spell from a spell slot, and that spell targets only a single ally, you can also attempt to remove a harmful condition from that ally. The condition must be one that could be removed by your [Mercy](/Feats.aspx?ID=225) feat, including those granted by later feats such as [Greater Mercy](/Feats.aspx?ID=232). Attempt a [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) check based on the spell's DC and level. This effect is in addition to the normal effects of your spell.
name: Blessed Spell
prerequisite: Blessed One Dedication; ability to cast spells from spell slots; Mercy
